entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Bas Caraquet 11:00 AM AST Friday 23 December 2022
Temperature: -0.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 72 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -5.2°C
Wind: E 22 km/h gust 34 km/h

entry.title: Friday: Snow mixed with ice pellets. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow mixed with ice pellets beginning this afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Rain at times heavy or snow. Temperature rising to 9 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with ice pellets changing to rain at times heavy this evening and ending before morning then partly cloudy. Fog patches developing this evening and dissipating before morning. Rainfall amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind east 60 km/h gusting to 90 except gusting to 110 over exposed areas. Wind becoming south 40 gusting to 70 before morning. Temperature rising to 9 by morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 5 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries late in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 5 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 23 December 2022
